::Ramulus::

Ramulus, who was facing BH and Blastrage, pulls Ramhorn out of the way of the 
grenades, the shrapnel digging into Ramulus' back. He narrows his eyes as he 
sees the bounty hunters retreat, rage slowly building in him. Next time they 
met, at least one of those two would die....

Ramulus continues dragging Ramhorn, entering the Ark.
